Fullbridge

Welcome to my styleguide! On this page, you will find all the design elements and typographic styles being utilized on http://fullbridge.com. The current theme is minimalism because less is more! But understand this correctly, Minimalism is not a lack of something. It’s simply the perfect amount of something.

Text Formats

Bold, italic, linked, visited, external, abbr, tooltip, code, small.

Paragraph

So whether you use a framework as part of your design process or not, when it’s time to go public, nothing will ever beat lean, hand-coded HTML and CSS.

Chinese

不同的人，在不同的位置，以鬥志和「自己的方式」展現了關懷、愛、堅持、感動和對世界­所促成的點點改變。這些都是發展，或許未必是主流「發展觀」的發展而已。在「發展」的­高速列車上，你可曾遺忘了窗外的風景？可有留意在鐵路兩旁已近枯萎的樹林？有否想過落­車，再悉心灌溉，讓樹林重見茂盛？

昨日是小小鬥志　祈求突破悶局闖一次
劈下樹開山兩次　由無路變吋吋慢慢移
要實現當天壯語　沿途活得相當有意義
今天也算為世間貢獻　卻怕轉折處欠勵志

Ligatures fj fl ff ffi ffl

Many ligatures combine f with an adjacent letter. The most prominent example is fi (or fi, rendered with two normal letters). The tittle of the i in many typefaces collides with the hood of the f when placed beside each other in a word, and are combined into a single glyph with the tittle absorbed into the f. Other ligatures with the letter f include fj, fl, ff, ffi, and ffl. Ligatures for fa, fe, fo, fr, fs, ft, fb, fh, fu, fy, and for f followed by a full stop, comma, or hyphen, as well as the equivalent set for the doubled ff and fft are also used, though are less common.
